alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 4:04PM MST until March 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 930 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 404 PM MST, Gauge reports indicate rising waters in creeks and streams, including New River. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... New River, Deadman Wash, North Canyon Creek and Beardsley Canal. Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... New River The low water crossing along Old Stage Road will likely become impassable. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
